title: Elasta Qp Soy Oyl UltraHydration Deep Conditioner, 32 oz
description: Elasta QP Soy OYL Deep Conditioner helps prevent breakage and infuses hair with moisture.

title: Fair & Lovely Ayurvedic Natural Fairness Cream 50g
description: Presenting New Fair & Lovely Ayurvedic now with the power of Ancient ayurvedia in soft, red Kumkumadi tailam speckles, 100% blended in the cream to give glowing, radiant skin. Unlike ordinary Herbal cream that claim to work through natural ingredients, Fair & lovely Ayurvedic actually delivers fairness through pure and proven Ayurvedic ingredients. In other words it has ZERO synthetic fairness actives. Fair & Lovely Ayurvedic with Kumkumadi tailam rejuvenates your skin giving you never before glowing, fair skin. What''s more, it has JASTBHASMA, an Ayurvedic Sunscreen known to protect skin from the sun''s darkening and damaging UV rays. It contains Kumkumadi Tailam, an ancient fairness recipe of 16 precious Ayurvedic ingredients detailed in the ancient texts as the secret to woman''s beauty. Nilotpala & Patanga: Soothe & relax skin cells, give a serene look Chandana & Ushira: Reduce skin irritation, give long lasting cooling sensation Manjishta & Kumkuma: Work from within your skin, reduce freckles & discoloration Laksa & Kumkuma (Kalkam): Improve skin texture, highlight complexion naturally Padmakesara & Padmaka: Work like and astringent, give even toned skin Yashtimadhu & Kumkuma (kalkam): Make skin glow, give visible radiance Ajakshira & Ksheera: Condition skin, give a soft moisturized feel Laksa (kalkam) & Nyagrodhapada: Smoothen skin, give clear flawless skin Lodhra: Lightens skin colour, reduces skin irritation

title: Glytone KP Kit, 15.1 ounce Package
description: To retexturize.   The 2-step system for keratosis pilaris incorporates intensive glycolic acid levels to rid the skin of unsightly bumps and reveal smooth supple skin.  Kit contains Body Lotion + Exfoliating Body Wash + Shower Pouf.

title: Crecepelo Tratamiento Fitioterapeutico Natural(Phitoterapeutic Treatment) 61oz
description: Crecepelo is the first Phytotherapeutic Treatment that involves the use of natural plants for hair growth.This innovative formula provides extracts and 100% natural assets necessary for a healthy hair avoiding excessive flaking and adding nutrients to return Health,Beauty,Vitality,Flexibility and Softness to the hair,helping its growth.DIRECTIONS:Apply treatment phytotherapeutic after shampoo and ceases act for 15 minutes,later retire with plenty of water.

title: Garnier Fructis Fall Fight Shampoo For Falling Breaking Hair, 13 Fluid Ounce
description: Noticing hair in your bathroom sink or brush. Fight back with the new fall fight 3-step system. Fall fight from garnier fructis helps improve hair's resistance to everyday hair-fall. The formulas with energizing caffeine, fortifying biotin and fruit vitamins, strengthen hair from root to ends, reducing falling, breaking strands. The result is stronger, fuller-looking hair.
